name: get_mart_gene_associations_resource
description: NOTE: this route has a limiter on it, you may be restricted in the number of downloads per hour. Use carefully.

slim.description: Map objects up (slim) to a higher level category. Value can be ontology class ID or subset ID

taxon.description: taxon of gene, must be of form NCBITaxon:9606

object_category.description: Category of entity at link Object (target), e.g. phenotype, disease
